tool_description: Loads and filters technician profiles with their skills, certifications, location, and basic availability status for assignment consideration.

technician_ids.description: Specific technician IDs to load. If empty, loads all active technicians.

location_filter.description: Geographic region filter (city, state, or zip code)

error_messages: Invalid technician ID: One or more technician IDs do not exist in the system
Location not found: The specified location filter does not match any known regions
Empty result set: No technicians match the specified filters
usage: Use without parameters to load all active technicians, or apply filters to get specific subsets. Results include all necessary profile data for assignment algorithms.

skills_matrix.description: Flattened list of all skills across loaded technicians

locations.description: Home base locations of loaded technicians
